acupoint.standard_location: 在踝区，外踝尖与跟腱之间的凹陷中
acupoint.standard_location_en: In the depression between the tip of the lateral malleolus and the Achilles tendon
acupoint.simple_method: 外脚踝骨最高点与跟腱之间的凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Find the hollow between the outer ankle bone and the Achilles tendon.
acupoint.anatomical: 有腓骨短肌，小隐静脉及腓肠神经
functions: 舒筋活络 (relax sinews, activate collaterals)
散风清热 (dispel wind, clear heat)
